channel.title: [PI] Monster Drop Help
channel.description:
I am having a problem with Monster Drops in NPCDrops.TSM
I have two NPCDrops.tsm one in .\bin\cfg\NPCDrops.TSM and one in .\Data\cfg\NPCDrops.TSM
Heres my NPCDrops.java [url=http://pastebin.com/ZdqGeMVf]http://pastebin.com/ZdqGeMVf[/url]
This is the code that I'm having problems with in NPCDrops.java [CODE]./Data/cfg/NPCDrops.TSM[/CODE]
I assume that's where it loads the drops from.
Well when the NPCDrops.TSM is left alone unedited it works fine but if I edit it it will compile but when I run the server I get this message.
[CODE]java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:71) Loaded clipmap in 443ms. [7/22/11 9:36 AM]: Launching Server... [/CODE]
When I get this it disables all drops (excluding charms).
The drops I'm trying to edit are the ones for Frost Dragons and this is the format I am using. [CODE] #Frost Dragon 10775:100 18830:1 [/CODE]
I tried everything I could think of and everything I have seen on google and still could not figure this out. This is the only thing that is stopping me from releasing my server and it's embarrassing because it's supposed to be simple monster drops. Can anyone help me? :(

item.title: [PI] Monster Drop Help
item.dc:creator: @Varmisher5150 Varmisher5150
item.description:
@Varmisher5150 wrote:

I am having a problem with Monster Drops in NPCDrops.TSM

I have two NPCDrops.tsm one in .\bin\cfg\NPCDrops.TSM and one in .\Data\cfg\NPCDrops.TSM

Heres my NPCDrops.java
http://pastebin.com/ZdqGeMVf

This is the code that I’m having problems with in NPCDrops.java

I assume that’s where it loads the drops from.

Well when the NPCDrops.TSM is left alone unedited it works fine but if I edit it it will compile but when I run the server I get this message.

java.util.NoSuchElementException: No line found at java.util.Scanner.nextLine(Unknown Source) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.loadDrops(NPCDrops.java:37) at server.model.npcs.NPCDrops.<init>(NPCDrops.java:15) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:71) Loaded clipmap in 443ms. [7/22/11 9:36 AM]: Launching Server...

When I get this it disables all drops (excluding charms).

The drops I’m trying to edit are the ones for Frost Dragons and this is the format I am using.

#Frost Dragon
10775:100        18830:1

I tried everything I could think of and everything I have seen on google and still could not figure this out. This is the only thing that is stopping me from releasing my server and it’s embarrassing because it’s supposed to be simple monster drops. Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
